title: remake/ takes away my autofill protection
body:
i don't like that a remake kills/uses up autofill protection
no what am saying fill 2 game then pick a roll just to get it taken away 
why not just pick a roll every time if theres no reward for fill

replies.body: Autofill is there to help players find games faster! Last Season we had an issue where players were unable to find a game quickly. Autofill was created to help players find those games, but we do understand it causes some issues and we're working to improve it.
